resources.string: "Concentration and solving last details of important plans." " Asking favors to people in high positions." " Obtaining legal moratoriums, recommendations and endorsements." " Dealing with public employees." " Signing wills, deeds or transfers." " Writing letter asking favours and promotions."

"Dealing with disreputable people." " Too much impulsivity can be dangerous." " Making a new businesses." " Acquisition of livestock." " Signing of treaties or agreements." " Money loans." " Moving to another city (home or business)." " Making the first financial investment for a new business." " Buying, renting or selling real estate."

"Matters related to art, music, house decoration and personal appearance." " Any material matter." " Starting a new business." " Buying livestock, debt collecting and treaties with companies and public administration." " Hiring representatives or proxies, collectors or sales representatives." " Benefits in dealing with newly known people." " Making short journeys." " Getting married." " Loaning and borrowing money." " Any social matters." " Market investments and any other investmens of speculative nature."
"Hiring servants or any low category employee." " Starting long journeys by sea or land to destinations far from home."

" Art and intellectual related matters: education, scientific investigations, publications, teaching in schools and educational campaigns." " Excellent time for study and analytical examinations of subjects, documents and commercial proposals." " Mental activities." " Buying livestock and related transactions." " Entering into contracts, collect debts, making new friends, hiring employees." " Starting campaigns or business promotions." " Starting any illness healing treatment." " Lending money." " Starting the construction of buildings." " Realizing new businesses." " Signing of documents." " Writing important letters."

"Dealing with public or private enemies; making them appear in court." " Buying/selling real estate." " Asking for favours." " Spiritual growth and concentration." " Surgeries." " Can easily be deceived by scammers, blackmailers, etc."

"Public related matters and businesses." " Doing educational work." " Planting seeds." " Starting new relations." " Hiring any kind of employee." " Short or long journeys by sea or land." " Literary or journalistic work." " Dating and marriages." " Any maritime matter." " Starting any health treatment." " Any shipment and transportation related matter." " Sending goods to distant places." " Surgeries." " Good for salesmen, travel agents and dealing with women."
"Creating ideas for new businesses, or making first investment for it." " Signing contracts or legal documents." " Borrowing and lending money." " Writing letters or requests of any kind."

"Matters that require aggression, or a lot of thought followed by an active campaign of ambitious work." " Put big mental plans in motion." " Deal with elderly people, judges or magistrates, and people with high State or business position." " Finishing any social or commercial plan." " Close any proposition of real value." " Literacy or journalistic work." " Advertisements or promotions by mail." " Starting any legal action." " Move to another house." " Buying, selling or transferring properties." " Scientific investigations or spiritual meditation."

"Signing contracts or agreements." " Collecting money or starting agricultural operations." " Planting seeds." " Making new friends." " Hiring servants, vendors or employees." " Making long journeys." " Marriages." " Healing treatments." " Lending money or borrowing it." " Constructing new buildings." " Dealing with public employees or prominent people." " Carry out speculations."

"Starting any new businesses." " Buying and selling livestock." " Business speculations." " Signing contacts, agreements and any kind of legal documents, collecting and money saving." " Education related work." " New social relations." " Starting long journeys for business or pleasure." " Short trips by sea or land, alternating between pleasure and business matters." " Dealing with lawyers." " Any legal matter." " Dating and marriages, social matters, or any constructive matter."
"Do not overload the body or the mind." " Do not exaggerate statements or become too impulsive." " Hiring employees." " Maritime matters."

"Mastering matters that require a great amount of energy, aggression and perseverance, and great physical effort." " Collecting money, hire vendors, collectors or agents." " Maritime and military matters." " Dealing with mechanic problems, either inventions or designs." " Scientific matters." " Women that try to obtain favours from high position people."

"Charity matters." " Receiving donations or favours." " Starting humanitarian activities." " Buying or speculating on livestock." " Dealing with enemies." " Starting long journeys." " Activities related to legal matters, marriages or favours." " Be careful with possible accidents and stay away from dangerous places, explosives are firearms." " Diseases might develop high fever." " In this cases, it is recommended that the body and mind remain inactive."
